items.sentence: Tom had difficulty convincing Mary that she should quit her job.
Tom told his dentist that he brushes his teeth after every meal.
I can\'t guarantee that I\'ll be able to do that, but I\'ll try.
Tom was about to kiss Mary when her father walked into the room.
I wasn\'t surprised when Tom told me he didn\'t have to do that.
I wasn\'t surprised when Tom told me he didn\'t need to do that.
Tom wants to live in Boston after he graduates from high school.
Tom was a little taller than I was when we were in grade school.
Tom was heartbroken when Mary told him that she was leaving him.
Tom doesn\'t like being cooped up in his small office every day.
Tom doesn\'t want to give up his dream of becoming an astronaut.
I\'d like to thank you again for everything you\'ve done for us.
Tom made it clear that he didn\'t want anything to do with Mary.
Tom and Mary dipped into their savings to buy their first house.
Tom didn\'t think that Mary would actually carry out her threat.
Didn\'t you know that Tom was going to be in Australia all week?
Don\'t forget to tell Mary that she has to get home before 2:30.
I think that I now have enough money to buy the car that I want.
Tom wished he hadn\'t promised Mary he\'d go to Boston with her.
Tom and Mary haven\'t yet told anybody they\'re getting married.
